thread.title: Excellent staff, backache from too-soft mattress
thread.title_full: Excellent staff, backache from too-soft mattress - Review of Home2 Suites by Hilton New York Long Island City/ Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Carol L
title: Excellent staff, backache from too-soft mattress
text: Excellent staff, great rooms include a kitchenette and step-in shower, ADA-height (18" AFF) toilet. Wide choice of items at complimentary breakfast buffet. Staff went out of their way to assist me with taxi service, quarters for on-site laundry, storage of luggage, etc. Mattress and pillows were too soft for me.
